item.description:
Julien-Marinetti's gigantic frenchie sculpture, Doggy John, is guarding the Palace gates thru September 12th. What palace in New York you ask? The New York Palace hotel! http://www.newyorkspa...

Meet up with other Boston, NYC and LI frenchies at 11am to view the sculpture, take pictures and then head down the road to Madison Square Park for some playtime at 1pm. Madison Square Park is between Fifth & Madison Avenues, at 24th Street on the western side of the park. http://www.madisonsqu...

Humans can even grab a snack at the infamous Shake Shack. http://www.madisonsqu...

And if your frenchies aren't too tired, we'll head over to Detmold Park for some quieter playtime at 3pm. Detmold Park is West of FDR Drive, between East 49th & East 51st streets. http://www.nycgovparks.org/parks/M108N/

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie...this covers the $12 monthly fee to host our meetup.com group online. Anything received in excess of the $12 will be donated to the French Bulldog Rescue Network in the group's name. :)

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde

Be there or be...a pug!
item.how_to_find_us: New York Palace Hotel, Madison Square Park, Detmold Park

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Pilgrimage to see Doggy John in NYC
